content: sl1 knitwise k2 pass slip_stitch over k2 to last 2 sts yo k2 24 sts row 2 ws yo k2 purl to last 2 sts k2 25 sts work row 1 and 2 for pattern to 175 sts or desired size start ending border blocking soak scarf in water adding soap appropriate for ending border fiber if desired rinse and wrap in towel to blot row 1 rs purl across out water lay flat and smooth into shape if using row 2 ws cast off stitches knitwise blocking wires run through eyelets along top sides finishing and bottom pin and leave in place until thoroughly weave in yarn ends and trim after blocking dry trim yarn ends chart chart note read chart from right to left chart symbols a k knit bb slip 1 stitch knitwise knit next 2 stitches and pass slipped stitch over 2 knit stitches to decrease 1 stitch o yo yarn over lava repeat chart row 2 yo k2 purl to last 2 sts k2 aao bbo aao 1 ending sts 3-st repeat beginning sts knitters symbols fonts © xrx increase www evelynclarkdesigns com lava lace scarf ©2012 by evelyn a clark page 2
